Katensa:
I can't give you a reward yet. Not till you've collected from Mucrokian Fanatics, Mucrokian Ascetics, Mucrokian Saviors, Mucrokian Prophets, Contaminated Mucrokians, and Awakened Mucrokians. When you kill them, you'll get Mucrokian Hides. Collect enough and you will get Quality Mucrokian Hide.
And, for that, I will give you a reward.
